p:
Many nutritional programmes (eg, School Health Programme, Micronutrient Initiative, National Programme for Family Planning and Primary Health Care, and Tawana Pakistan Project) have been initiated by governmental and nongovernmental organisations ( table 5).
276 Some of these programmes focus on raising awareness in the general public, and others focus on directly supplying food or fortified nutrition to communities. A national action plan for prevention and control of non-communicable diseases and health promotion
277 has been devised but has not been implemented. The Ministry of Planning and Development and Reform, in collaboration with the UN Food and Agriculture Organization, launched the Pakistan dietary guidelines for better nutrition in December, 2018.
278
